Row.Text: Sakoku
Wants to stay safe from conquest. Dislikes those who have conquered other player's original capitals.
I am Tokugawa Ieyasu, sh≈çgun of Japan. Nothing happens here without my say.
Be careful and come at me! I'll wait for your unguarded point.
The sharp-edged sword cuts through the void, and within the raging fire, a cool wind blows.
Strong borders make for good neighbors.
We can manage our own affairs. Without you.
The summer grasses are all that remains of warriors' dreams.
We shall continue forward in the spirit of friendship.
Mind your own affairs, and stay out of mine.
I understand the value of peace. Do you, as well?
Let us share a cup of tea before you go.
We manage our own affairs.
Your delegation has visited the floating world, and return with minds full of dreams.
Treachery always wears the face of friendship.
We send to you a representation of all the goods of Edo: silver, steel, our artists' woodcuts. And some mochi, for later.
Resentment is neither appropriate for others, nor for oneself.
You have become a threat to us. (Denounces You)
We will permit you to see our city, briefly.
I am not disagreeable.
I will share with you our extent and borders, that you will know what is mine, and not yours.
My time is short.
I can be a steadfast ally; ask Oda, ask Hideyoshi.
The heroes retreat, and go home. Night falls, and day breaks in fog.
I am sorry. This is a war we still must wage. It will be painful to you.
Our warriors' armor will rust, as they return to their fields. As it should.
We will permit you in our lands, but under close watch.
I will not plunge my nation into war by permitting foreigners to tramp around in it.
We desire passage through your lands en route to other goals.
I have seen far too many armies travel claiming friendship, but meaning war.
We must consider carefully, and cannot accept now.
I can see the benefit here.
Mashhad
+5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength attacking full Health Units. (Nader Shah)
Jazayerchi
Likes civilizations with a high amount of land units. Dislikes civilizations with a low amount of land units.
(Appreciates your expansive array of land units.)
(Your military lacks for land units.)
Nader Shah is pleased with your large standing army
Nader Shah is unhappy you do not have a large standing army
Hoofbeats tremble the plain yet again, and the world holds its breath at the name of Nader Shah.
I yearn for this war.
The whispers of your nobles and courtiers will disappear in the roar of my troops.
I would love to speak to you of the beauty of horses.
You should never seek a land war on my continent.
How shall a man escape from what is written? How can I flee from my destiny?
May your breath be warm!
I cannot stand social climbers that rise via sycophancy.
We must unite in friendship, lest we be destroyed in division.
In a world beset with enemies, to find a friend is the best good.
I see your plots and plans, and will have no part of them..
Your delegation has returned, dazzled by jewels and deafened by the roar of our military formations.
You sending riches to me is like pouring water in the ocean. You expect the ocean to be impressed?
The wonders of the Persian Empire: lavash and koresh, kabab and kufte, with rosewater-flavored noodles for afterwards.
Clever. Let us see what answer you will give to fire and steel.
I delight in a worthy foe. I will have to settle for you. (Denounces You)
All the riches of the world pour into my cities. Come, see them.
All the riches of the world pour into my cities. Come, see them.
Come and see the breadth of our empire, and tell us of yours.
You are in my presence. Speak.
Let us circle each other in friendship.
We have carried off all that we are able to.
The fires still rage - in your lands, in our hearts.
Our blades have grown dull and our hearts cooled. Let us have peace.
We understand that Persia exists at a nexus of roads; you are free to travel them.
Let you in, so you can scout our defenses and plan your next assault? No, never.
We ride forth to glorious conquest - may we pass peaceably through your lands?
Do you hunger for war in the same way that I do? Tell me plainly.
It is my right to refuse this.
It is natural you should suggest such a deal to me.
Golden Age of Suleiman
Impressed by any civilization that earns a Golden Age. Dislikes those in Dark Ages.
+4 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength when not in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age against units who are also not in a [ICON_GLORY_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age. (Suleiman)
